name: Shashank Sharma
title: Tech Lead
message: In terms of energy, Ganesh is very active. Perform at all times by taking risks. Using Python, he developed Rasa chat bots. Dedicated to his work, he always puts in his best effort.

name: ASHUTOSH TRIPATHI
title: Architecting Digital Excellence || Software Engineer || Continuous Learner
message: Ganesh worked with me on the same project. He is a quick learner and masters the art of R&D. He is really passionate of learning and implementing the ML projects which proves him to be a good asset for AI and ML industry.

name: Vijay James
title: Software Engineer
message: If I could describe Ganesh in one word it would be tenacious. His dogged pursuit of excellence in whatever he sets out to do, and his persistence with which he keeps on at it, was highly inspiring during our time together in college. Another one of his endearing qualities is managing a team in adverse conditions, a case in point being one of the group projects in which he was instrumental in assessing the skill of each member and assigning the responsibilities accordingly, which ensured successfully completion of project within the deadline and without compromising on the quality. I firmly believe that Ganesh would truly be an asset for any position requiring technical and soft skills and comes with my heartfelt recommendation.

name: Sunny Singh
title: Frontend Lead | Angular | React
message: Worked with ganesh almost 7-8 months.He is like God gifted in R&D type work. Good in problem solving . Innovative mind and always ready to work on new ideas and technology. Would love to work with him in future.

name: Vikrant Sandal
title: Software Engineer 2 @Smartly.io
message: To say heâ€™s a team leader would be an understatement,even though we worked on a project for barely 1 month, with ganesh handling the ML part of the project. He successfully lead a team of ML interns, pitched innovative solutions and brought alternatives to like a true data scientist.
